description:
Build two E-commerce websites with Prestashop for your business, this course is going to teach you exactly what you need to know from start to finish.

Learn everything you need to know to get you started with setting up your Prestashop eCommerce business, but first, you must have a version installed locally on the PC or on a server to begin the design of two eCommerce sites: the first is a clothing store (men / women); the second is a site of PC hardware.

You'll also learn how to configure the look of Prestashop and feel of the site with themes and we'll look at configuring payments, shipping, and how to manage orders and much more!

Do you want start an useful online business? Enroll today and get started with building your own online store!
title: Prestashop Tutorial: Practical Learning
